snippet.title: Shadow Hearts Gameplay
snippet.description:
Shadow Hearts Gameplay so you guys can see more or less how the game is and tell me if you want more or not. One of the best games you've never played.

I'm not sure how I feel about doing RPG's because I'd have to edit out the battles, but Shadow Hearts is one of my old favorite games, and its a great game indeed! :)

This is a link to the prequel of Shadow Hearts, a game called Koudelka for Playstation.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koudelka

My Twitter:  twitter.com/J1tails
My Like Page: facebook.com/J1tails
